front.title: •Weapon Of An Ungrateful Son
front.gametext: USED: If a lightsaber was just used to enhance a Force drain, place it in owner's Used Pile.  LOST: Place any or all of you devices and character weapons on table in your Used Pile.
front.lore: When Vader dueled Luke at Cloud City, he fought a son trained by his former master and a weapon constructed by his former self.
